passive.title: Flow
passive.desc: Valéria heals for 7 health every time she performs a swap.

core.title: Whirlpool Spin
core.desc: Deal 20/40/70 damage, heal yourself for 10/20/40 health, and perform 0/1/2 swaps. Perform 1 additional swap when invoking a water match.

spell1.title: Mariposa
spell1.desc: Deal 30-60 damage. Target 2 tiles, the first target forces into the space of the second target, destroying the second and leaving a water tile behind in its original cell.

spell2.title: Rain Dance
spell2.desc: For 5 turns, add 3-5 water tiles into the board in random columns and heal yourself for 15-25 health at the start of each turn.

spell3.title: Balanco
spell3.desc: For 3 turns, deal 7 damage to your opponent whenever water tiles are dropped into the board or are swapped.

signature.title: Hurricane Cutter
signature.desc: Perform 4 swaps. Any 3/4/5-matches made during this time are triggered automatically, dealing 30/60/100 damage to your opponent and adding 2/3/4 water tiles into the board in random columns.
